conflictDescription: The developer wants all meetings online with focused participation and minimal distractions, which requires sending notifications and messages. The older adult wants to block almost all notifications and messages to avoid disturbance, which can limit communication and focused online meetings.
conflictingNfrPairs: All meetings must be held online only
Block almost all notifications from ALFRED
Online meetings should support focused participation
Block almost all messages from ALFRED
The system must minimize distractions during online meetings
Prevent disturbance and feeling of being overwhelmed
userStoryASummary: As a developer, I want all meetings to be online only so I can focus and avoid distractions.
userStoryBSummary: As an older person, I want to block almost all ALFRED notifications and messages, so I do not feel disturbed or overwhelmed.
